ygData.subject: RE: Questions about bards weapons?
ygData.msgSnippet: personnally i d ditch the writhing staff, sure its cute looking and has a proc, but i just dont get why a bard who relies on charisma would take  a hit to
ygData.messageBody:
personnally i'd ditch the writhing staff, sure its cute looking and has a
proc, but i just dont get why a bard who relies on charisma would take a
hit to charisma intentionally. thats like a wizard using int lowering items

I could of had a staff last night in a trade but it just had so minimal
value in my eyes... i felt like if the guy was trying to sell a freezer to
someone that lives in an igloo

Minkin Nehoc
Solusek Ro
level 30 bard

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sean Gifford [SMTP:Giffords@...]
> Sent: September 1, 1999 5:33 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Questions about bards weapons?
>
> From: "Sean Gifford" <Giffords@...>
>
> First off, *Drools over these excellent weapons!* and now for the
> important
> part.
>
> The barbed leather whip you might wanna sell, because the dragoon dirk
> and the Silvery axe and the Writhing staff all have better attack ratio's
> than it. and like I just said, the writhing staff and the Silvery axe
> have
> the same attack ratio's. I know not the stats on the Mace, so I cannot
> help
> thee there. personally I would have writhing staff in primary, and
> silvery
> axe in secondary :).
>
> Gleeman Merrilin, Bard of the 20th song (.5 bubbles from 21 again, after
> falling out of the aviak house :( ).
> Currently dual weilding a Silvery axe and a Dragoon Dirk :)
> -----Original Message-----
> From: CMai <CMai@...>
> To: Eqbards (E-mail) <eqbards@onelist.com>

> >
> >Thank you,
